sendTab.title: Send
sendTab.shareIntentInfo: You can also use the "Share" feature of your mobile device to select files more easily.
sendTab.help: Please ensure that the desired target is also on the same Wi-Fi network.

general.title: General
general.minimizeToTray: Minimize to the System Tray/Menu Bar when closing

send.title: Send
send.shareViaLinkAutoAccept: Automatically accept requests in "Share via link" mode

network.title: Network
network.needRestart: Restart the server to apply the settings!
network.portWarning: You might not be detected by other devices because you are using a custom port. (default: {defaultPort})
network.multicastGroupWarning: You might not be detected by other devices because you are using a custom multicast address. (default: {defaultMulticast})

troubleshootPage.title: Troubleshoot
troubleshootPage.subTitle: Does the app not work as expected? Here you can find some common solutions to problems.

firewall.symptom: This device can send files to other devices but other devices cannot send files to this device.
firewall.solution: This is most likely a firewall issue. You can solve this by allowing incoming connections (UDP and TCP) on port {port}.

noDiscovery.symptom: This device cannot discover other devices.
noDiscovery.solution: Please make sure that all devices are on the same Wi-Fi network and share the same configuration (port, multicast address, encryption). You can try to type the IP address of the target device manually. If this works, consider adding this device to the favorites so it can be automatically discovered in the future.

noConnection.symptom: Both devices cannot discover each other nor can they share files.
noConnection.solution: Does the problem exist on both sides? If so, you need to make sure that both devices are on the same Wi-Fi network and share the same configuration (port, multicast address, encryption). The Wi-Fi network may not allow communication between participants due to Access Point (AP) Isolation. In this case, this option must be disabled on the router.

networkInterfacesPage.title: Network Interfaces
networkInterfacesPage.info: By default, LocalSend uses all available network interfaces. You can exclude unwanted networks here. You need to restart the server to apply the changes.

subTitle.one: wants to send you a file

receivePage.canceled: The sender has canceled the request.

receiveOptionsPage.title: Options
receiveOptionsPage.saveToGalleryOff: Turned off automatically because there are folders.

sendPage.rejected: The recipient has rejected the request.
sendPage.busy: The recipient is busy with another request.

remainingTime.@hours: Use 'h' for hours abbreviation and 'm' for minutes
remainingTime.@days: Use 'd' for days, 'h' for hours, and 'm' for minutes

webSharePage.title: Share via link
webSharePage.error: An error occurred while starting the server.

openLink.one: Open this link in your browser:
openLink.other: Open one of these links in your browser:

webSharePage.encryptionHint: LocalSend uses a self-signed certificate. You need to accept it in your browser.

aboutPage.title: About LocalSend
description: LocalSend is a free, open-source app that allows you to securely share files and messages with nearby devices over your local network without needing an internet connection.
This app is available on Android, iOS, macOS, Windows and Linux. You can find all download options on the official homepage.
aboutPage.author: Author

donationPage.title: Donate
donationPage.info: LocalSend is free, open-source and without any ads. If you like the app, you can support the development with a donation.

aliasGenerator(ignoreMissing, ignoreGpt).@info: Different locales may have different words, it may not match 1:1
aliasGenerator(ignoreMissing, ignoreGpt).@combination: In some languages, the adjective must be last.

addFile.title: Add to selection
addFile.content: What do you want to add?

openFile.title: Open file
openFile.content: Do you want to open the received file?

cancelSession.title: Cancel files transfer
cancelSession.content: Do you really want to cancel the files transfer?

cannotOpenFile.title: Cannot open file
cannotOpenFile.content: Could not open "{file}". Has this file been moved, renamed or deleted?

encryptionDisabledNotice.title: Encryption disabled
encryptionDisabledNotice.content: Communication now takes place via the unencrypted HTTP protocol. To use HTTPS protocol, enable encryption again.

favoriteDeleteDialog.title: Delete from favorites
favoriteDeleteDialog.content: Do you really want to delete from favorites "{name}"?

historyClearDialog.title: Clear history
historyClearDialog.content: Do you really want to delete the entire history?

localNetworkUnauthorized.title: @:dialogs.noPermission.title
localNetworkUnauthorized.description: LocalSend can't find other devices without having the permission to scan the local network. Please grant this permission in the settings.

noFiles.title: No files selected
noFiles.content: Please select at least one file.

noPermission.title: No permission
noPermission.content: You have not granted the necessary permissions. Please grant them in the settings.

notAvailableOnPlatform.title: Not available
notAvailableOnPlatform.content: This feature is only available on:

quickSaveNotice.title: @:general.quickSave
quickSaveNotice.content: File requests are now accepted automatically. Be aware that everyone on the local network can send you files.

quickSaveFromFavoritesNotice.title: @:general.quickSaveFromFavorites
content: File requests are now accepted automatically from devices in your favorites list.
Warning! Currently, this is not entirely secure, as a hacker who has the fingerprint of any device from your favorites list can send you files without restriction.
However, this option is still safer than allowing all users on the local network to send you files without restriction.

sendModeHelp.title: Send modes
sendModeHelp.single: Sends files to one recipient. Selection will be cleared after finished files transfer.
sendModeHelp.multiple: Sends files to multiple recipients. Selection will not be cleared after finished files transfer.
sendModeHelp.link: Recipients who do not have LocalSend installed can download the selected files by opening the link in their browser.

tray.@info: Apple Guidelines are very strict about the "close" wording.

assetPicker.@info: Translations for the Media selection tool for Android and iPhone
assetPicker.unableToAccessAll: Unable to access all files on the device
assetPicker.viewingLimitedAssetsTip: Only view files and albums accessible to the app.
assetPicker.accessAllTip: App can only access some files on the device. Go to system settings and allow the app to access all media on the device.
